title: Free WiFi QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your WiFi network. Guests scan it to connect instantly — no typing passwords.
body: Stop telling guests your WiFi password. Create a QR code that connects them automatically when scanned. Works with all smartphones.

faq.q: How does a WiFi QR code work?
faq.a: The QR encodes your network name, password, and security type. When scanned, the phone auto-connects to your WiFi.

faq.q: Is my WiFi password stored on LinkToQR?
faq.a: For static QR: no, everything stays in your browser. For dynamic QR: the encoded data is stored securely on our server.

title: Free UPI Payment QR Code Generator
description: Create a QR code for UPI payments. Customers scan to pay via Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, and more.
body: Accept UPI payments instantly with a QR code. Print it at your shop, add it to invoices, or share online. Supports all UPI apps.

faq.q: Which UPI apps work with this QR code?
faq.a: All UPI-compliant apps: Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, BHIM, Amazon Pay, and more.

faq.q: Can I set a fixed payment amount?
faq.a: Yes, you can encode a fixed amount in the UPI QR code. The customer will see it pre-filled.

title: Free WhatsApp QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code that opens a WhatsApp chat. Perfect for business cards, flyers, and customer support.
body: Let customers message you on WhatsApp with a single scan. Pre-fill a greeting message so they don't have to type anything.

faq.q: What URL format does WhatsApp QR use?
faq.a: It uses https://wa.me/91XXXXXXXXXX?text=Hello. You enter this URL and we generate the QR.

faq.q: Do I need WhatsApp Business?
faq.a: No, it works with both regular WhatsApp and WhatsApp Business.

title: Free Instagram QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code that opens your Instagram profile. Grow followers from print, events, and packaging.
body: Turn any physical surface into a follower growth channel. Print this QR on business cards, product packaging, stickers, or event banners.

faq.q: What link should I use?
faq.a: Use https://instagram.com/yourusername. The QR will open your profile directly.

faq.q: Can I track how many followers came from the QR?
faq.a: With Dynamic QR, you can track total scans. Combine with Instagram Insights to estimate conversions.

title: Free YouTube QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for any YouTube video or channel. Ideal for presentations, classrooms, and marketing.
body: Link any YouTube video, playlist, or channel to a scannable QR code. Perfect for teachers, marketers, and presenters.

faq.q: Can I link to a specific video timestamp?
faq.a: Yes! Use a YouTube URL with a timestamp (e.g., ?t=120) and the QR will open at that moment.

faq.q: Does it work with YouTube Shorts?
faq.a: Yes, any YouTube URL works including Shorts, playlists, and live streams.

title: Free Google Maps QR Code Generator
h1: Create a Google Maps QR Code
description: Generate a QR code for any location on Google Maps. Perfect for event invitations and business directions.
body: Help people find your location instantly. Scan this QR to open Google Maps with your exact pin. Great for weddings, offices, and restaurants.

faq.q: How do I get my Google Maps link?
faq.a: Open Google Maps, find your location, click 'Share', and copy the link. Paste it here.

faq.q: Does it work on Apple Maps?
faq.a: The QR opens a Google Maps URL. On iPhone, it opens in the browser or Google Maps app if installed.

title: Free Restaurant Menu QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your restaurant menu. Customers scan to view your menu — no app needed.
body: Contactless dining made easy. Upload your menu as a PDF or link, generate a QR code, and print it on table tents. Update your menu anytime with Dynamic QR.

faq.q: Can I update the menu without reprinting QR codes?
faq.a: Yes! Use Dynamic QR mode. Change the destination URL anytime — the printed QR code stays the same.

faq.q: What file format should my menu be?
faq.a: Host your menu as a PDF on Google Drive, or use a website. Then paste the link here.

title: Free vCard QR Code Generator
h1: Create a Digital Business Card QR
description: Generate a QR code for your digital business card. Share your contact info with a single scan.
body: Replace paper business cards with a scannable QR code. The contact saves directly to their phone — name, email, phone, company, all in one scan.

faq.q: What is a vCard QR code?
faq.a: A vCard QR encodes your contact information (name, phone, email, company) so it auto-saves to the scanner's phone contacts.

faq.q: Can I include my photo?
faq.a: Standard vCard QR supports text fields only. For a photo, link to a digital profile page instead.

title: Free PDF QR Code Generator
h1: Create a QR Code for PDF
description: Generate a QR code that opens any PDF file. Share documents, brochures, and reports with a scan.
body: Upload your PDF to Google Drive, Dropbox, or any hosting service. Paste the link here and we'll create a QR code that opens it directly.

faq.q: Where should I host my PDF?
faq.a: Google Drive (set sharing to 'Anyone with the link') is the easiest. Dropbox and OneDrive also work.

faq.q: Can I change the PDF later?
faq.a: With Dynamic QR, yes! Just update the destination URL in your Dashboard — the QR code stays the same.

title: Free LinkedIn QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your LinkedIn profile. Grow your professional network from events and business cards.
body: Add a LinkedIn QR to your business card, resume, or conference badge. One scan connects professionals to your profile instantly.

faq.q: Where do I find my LinkedIn URL?
faq.a: Go to your LinkedIn profile → click 'Contact info' → copy your profile URL (e.g., linkedin.com/in/yourname).

faq.q: Can I track who scanned my LinkedIn QR?
faq.a: With Dynamic QR, you can see scan count. LinkedIn also shows profile views which you can correlate.

title: Free Event QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your event registration, tickets, or details page. Simplify event check-in.
body: Create QR codes for event registration links, ticket pages, or Google Calendar events. Print on posters, invitations, or social media.

faq.q: Can I use this for event check-in?
faq.a: Yes! Link to your check-in page or form. With Dynamic QR, you can track scan counts to monitor attendance.

faq.q: How do I create a Google Calendar event QR?
faq.a: Create the event in Google Calendar, copy the event link, and paste it here.

title: Free App Download QR Code Generator
h1: Create an App Download QR Code
description: Generate a QR code that links to your app on the App Store or Google Play. Drive mobile downloads.
body: Get more app downloads from physical marketing. Print QR codes on flyers, packaging, and ads that link directly to your app store listing.

faq.q: Can it detect iOS vs Android?
faq.a: The QR links to one URL. For smart redirection, use a service like onelink.to and paste that link here.

faq.q: Can I track downloads from the QR code?
faq.a: With Dynamic QR, you see scan count. Use UTM parameters in your store link for precise attribution.

title: Free Google Review QR Code Generator
h1: Create a Google Review QR Code
description: Generate a QR code that opens your Google Reviews page. Get more 5-star reviews from happy customers.
body: Place this QR on receipts, tables, or thank-you cards. Customers scan → your Google review page opens → they leave a review in seconds.

faq.q: How do I find my Google review link?
faq.a: Search your business on Google → click 'Write a review' → copy the URL from your browser.

faq.q: Can I use this for other review platforms?
faq.a: Yes! Paste any review page URL — Yelp, TripAdvisor, Trustpilot, etc.

title: Free Email QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code that opens a pre-filled email. Scan to email with subject and body ready.
body: Use mailto: links to create QR codes that open the email app with pre-filled recipient, subject, and body text. Great for support and feedback.

faq.q: What format does the email QR use?
faq.a: Use a mailto URL: mailto:you@example.com?subject=Hello&body=Hi%20there. Paste it here.

faq.q: Does it work on all devices?
faq.a: Yes, all smartphones and computers recognize mailto links and open the default email app.

title: Free Facebook QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your Facebook page or profile. Grow your page from offline marketing.
body: Link your Facebook business page, profile, or group to a QR code. Print on packaging, posters, and receipts to drive more likes and follows.

faq.q: What URL should I use for my Facebook page?
faq.a: Go to your Facebook page → copy the URL from the address bar (e.g., facebook.com/yourpage).

faq.q: Can I link to a specific Facebook post?
faq.a: Yes, copy the URL of any individual post and paste it here.

title: Free Twitter/X QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your Twitter/X profile or tweet. Grow followers from print and events.
body: Share your X profile, a specific tweet, or a pre-composed tweet via QR code. Perfect for events, slides, and business cards.

faq.q: Can I create a QR for a pre-composed tweet?
faq.a: Yes! Use https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Hello to create a QR that opens a ready-to-post tweet.

faq.q: Does it work for X (formerly Twitter)?
faq.a: Yes, both twitter.com and x.com URLs work. X redirects automatically.

title: Free Zoom Meeting QR Code Generator
h1: Create a Zoom Meeting QR Code
description: Generate a QR code for your Zoom meeting link. One-scan join for attendees.
body: Share Zoom meeting links via QR code on projector slides, printouts, or event signage. Attendees scan to join — no typing meeting IDs.

faq.q: Where do I get my Zoom meeting link?
faq.a: Open Zoom → Schedule a meeting → copy the join link (e.g., zoom.us/j/123456789).

faq.q: Can I update the meeting link for next week?
faq.a: With Dynamic QR, yes! Update the destination URL in your Dashboard for recurring meetings.

title: Free Spotify QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for any Spotify song, playlist, album, or artist page. Share music offline.
body: Share your Spotify playlist at parties, on posters, or on merch. Guests scan → your playlist opens in their Spotify app.

faq.q: Does it open the Spotify app directly?
faq.a: On mobile, if Spotify is installed, the link opens in the app. Otherwise, it opens in the browser.

faq.q: Can I use a Spotify URI instead of a URL?
faq.a: Use the HTTPS URL (open.spotify.com/...) — it works universally on all devices.

title: Free Telegram QR Code Generator
description: Generate a QR code for your Telegram channel, group, or profile. Grow your community offline.
body: Print Telegram QR codes on stickers, flyers, and business cards. One scan joins your channel or opens a direct message.

faq.q: What URL should I use?
faq.a: Use t.me/yourchannel for channels, t.me/yourusername for DMs, or t.me/joinchat/... for groups.

faq.q: Do users need Telegram installed?
faq.a: The link works in the browser too, but for the best experience, the Telegram app should be installed.

title: Free Bitcoin QR Code Generator
h1: Create a Bitcoin Payment QR Code
description: Generate a QR code for your Bitcoin wallet address. Receive crypto payments with a simple scan.
body: Create a Bitcoin QR code for donations, payments, or tips. The scanner's wallet app reads the address instantly — no copy-paste errors.

faq.q: What format does the Bitcoin QR use?
faq.a: Use bitcoin:YOUR_ADDRESS or paste your wallet address directly. We support both formats.

faq.q: Does it work with other crypto?
faq.a: Enter any cryptocurrency address URL, such as ethereum: or litecoin: URIs.
